title: General Grant National Memorial: Donate
body: Donate       Financial contributions toward the preservation, education, and special public programming at General Grant National Memorial are gratefully accepted. Small cash donations may be made at the donation box located at the site's visitor center. Larger donations are accepted by check or money order made payable to the "National Park Service" and sent to the following address:  General Grant National Memorial C/O Manhattan Sites ATTN: Superintendent 26 Wall Street New York, NY 10005 If you have a specific park program that you would like to target for your donation, please write a letter or note specifying where you would like it to be directed. If you make no specific request, the funds will be deposited in a "general" donation account, which typically funds educational and interpretive programming at General Grant National Memorial.
